name: ergo-file

screenshots.caption: chorme-like nav bar for ftp browsing

short_description:
User centric, modern, cross platform FTP client. Distant files manager.

cross platform with mobile phone version (Mac, Windows, Linux, Android, AIR runtime)
easy to skin, modern user interface
easy to install, deploy and maintain
Innovative user experience inspired by internet browsers and file explorers. The golden age of FTP is back!

Here is a preview of what the UI looks like in the prototype (v0.1 of the RoadMap). See the FunctionalSpecifications for more details.
summary: this project is not active anymore, this is an archive
